//addition

package zensar;

public class Addition {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int a=10;
		int b=20;
		
		System.out.println( a+b );
	}

}

//substraction

package zensar;

public class Substraction {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int a=20;
		int b=10;
		
		int c= a-b;
		
		System.out.println("Substract b from a= "+c );

	}

}


// division

package zensar;

public class Division {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		
		
		
				// TODO Auto-generated method stub

				int a=4;
				int b=4;
				
				System.out.println("Division of  a with b= "+a/b);
			
	}

}


//multiplication

package zensar;

public class Multiplication {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int a=2;
		int b=4;
		
		System.out.println("Multiply a with b= "+a*b);
	}

}
